meanings.definition: characteristic of or suitable for summer
meanings.sent1: The light, summerly dress was perfect for the warm weather.
meanings.sent2: The beach umbrella provided a summerly shade from the sun.
meanings.sent3: The ice cream truck played a summerly tune as it drove through the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: The vibrant colors of the flowers gave the garden a summerly feel.
meanings.sent5: The smell of freshly cut grass was a summerly reminder of the season.

meanings.sent1: The summerly thunderstorm brought much-needed rain to the dry fields.
meanings.sent2: The summerly festival attracted tourists from all over the country.
meanings.sent3: The summerly heat made the ice cream melt quickly.
meanings.sent4: The summerly nights were filled with the sound of crickets.
meanings.sent5: The summerly solstice marked the longest day of the year.
